summary:
Heartless Kinetao enb is going for the next step to devour your soul with its "Eclipse" preset.
No lens flares, just a natural and ultra-realistic, yet dark and somber enb preset.

- "The only way to survive among the cursed is to become one of them. Become Heartless"
descriptionHtml:
[center]LaBeatbeatbox

presents

a finetuned atmospheric enb preset

[size=5][b][i]Heartless Kinetao Eclipse[/i][/b] ENB
[/size]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59688-1-1415212357.jpg[/img][/center]









No lens flares, no trouble...

This enb is not compatible with CoT or any other weather or lighting condition altering mod.
If you use said mods, deactivate them with your modmanager.

[center]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59688-2-1415212357.jpg[/img][/center]
To install this enb, first remove all enb / sweet fx files from your skyrim folder ( if you used enb / sweet fx before )
You will need the 132 binaries:
[url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0132.htm]0.132 binaries from enbdev.com[/url]
pick the d3d9.dll file from the wrapper folder. (not the injector)
and put them into your skyrim main folder

download my preset and put all enb files in your skyrim main folder.

[center]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/59688-3-1415212357.jpg[/img][/center]
The curse of the Kinetao will engulf even your mind, eventually. Everybody will become Heartless... And if you are one of "the cursed", hit ENDORSE
and check out the other Heartless Kinetao enbs:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59529/?]Heartless Kinetao Cinegraph[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58979/?]Heartless Kinetao ENB[/url]

Heartless Kinetao ENB preset by LaBeatbeatbox
author: LaBeatBeatbox
